00030 class SIM_API cDatarateChannel : public cChannel //implies noncopyable
00031 {
00032   private:
00033     enum {
00034       FL_ISDISABLED = 128,
00035       FL_DELAY_NONZERO = 256,
00036       FL_DATARATE_NONZERO = 512,
00037       FL_BER_NONZERO = 1024,
00038       FL_PER_NONZERO = 2048,
00039     };
00040 
00041     // cached values of parameters (note: parameters are non-volatile)
00042     simtime_t delayparam; // propagation delay
00043     double datarateparam; // data rate
00044     double berparam;    // bit error rate
00045     double perparam;    // packet error rate
00046 
00047     // stores the end of the last transmission; used if there is a datarate
00048     simtime_t txfinishtime;
00049 
00050   private:
00051     // internal: checks whether parameters have been set up
00052     void checkState() const  {if (!parametersFinalized()) throw cRuntimeError(this, ePARAMSNOTREADY);}
00053 
00054   protected:
00055     // internal: update cached copies of parameters
00056     void rereadPars();
00057 
00061     virtual void handleParameterChange(const char *parname);
00062 
00063   public:
00066 
00072     explicit cDatarateChannel(const char *name=NULL);
00073 
00077     virtual ~cDatarateChannel();
00078 
00083     static cDatarateChannel *create(const char *name);
00085 
00092     virtual std::string info() const;
00094 
00100     virtual bool isTransmissionChannel() const {return true;}
00101 
00105     virtual void setDelay(double d);
00106 
00112     virtual void setDatarate(double d);
00113 
00119     virtual void setBitErrorRate(double d);
00120 
00126     virtual void setPacketErrorRate(double d);
00127 
00131     virtual void setDisabled(bool d);
00132 
00137     virtual simtime_t getDelay() const {checkState(); return delayparam;}
00138 
00145     virtual double getDatarate() const  {checkState(); return datarateparam;}
00146 
00153     virtual double getBitErrorRate() const  {checkState(); return berparam;}
00154 
00161     virtual double getPacketErrorRate() const  {checkState(); return perparam;}
00162 
00168     virtual bool isDisabled() const  {checkState(); return flags & FL_ISDISABLED;}
00170 
00176     virtual simtime_t calculateDuration(cMessage *msg) const;
00177 
00186     virtual simtime_t getTransmissionFinishTime() const {return txfinishtime;}
00187 
00192     virtual bool isBusy() const {return simTime() < txfinishtime;}
00193 
00195 
00201     virtual void finalizeParameters();
00202 
00206     virtual bool deliver(cMessage *msg, simtime_t at);
00208 };
